comment.author: 30079014@N03
comment._content: This looks like the baths in Switzerland we used to visit in the mid 50s! Ours had wooden plank boardwalks and was green and slimy most of the time. The change rooms looked similar to this one. Must be universal public baths design :)

comment.author: 56424922@N08
comment._content: Love the pic, bring back the old days.

comment._content: Nice shot Sam, but with a better camera you wouldn't have got the same shot.
